Class Hero

java.lang.Object
hw4.heroes.Hero
Direct Known Subclasses:
Berserker, Healer, Tank
public abstract class Hero extends Object
An abstract class that represents any Hero

  • Constructor Details

    • Hero

      protected Hero(String name, int maxHitPoints, int atkDamage, Heroes.Role role, Team team)
      The hero's constructor, which should only be called by subclasses
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the hero
      maxHitPoints - the maximum health for the hero
      atkDamage - the damage the hero deals per-attack
      role - the hero's role
      team - the hero's team

  • Method Details

    • attack

      public void attack(Hero target)
      The attack method, called once per turn to deal damage to a target
      Parameters:
      target - the target of the attack

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Gives the hero's name
      Returns:
      the name of the hero

    • getRole

      public Heroes.Role getRole()
      Gives the hero's role
      Returns:
      the role of the hero

    • hasFallen

      public boolean hasFallen()
      Whether the hero is dead
      Returns:
      true if the hero is dead, false if the hero is alive

    • heal

      public void heal(int amount)
      Used to heal the hero by a given amount
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount to heal the hero

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage(int amount)
      Damages the hero
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount to reduce hitPoints by

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Creates a string containing the hero's name, role, and current health
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string containing the status of a given hero

    • create

      public static Hero create(Heroes.Role role, Team team, Party party)
      Abstract factory used to create different types of Hero
      Parameters:
      role - the role of the new Hero
      team - the team the new Hero is on
      party - the party the new Hero is a part of
      Returns:
      a new Hero of either type Berserker, Healer, or Tank
